parameters.formDescription:
=Fill this for to apply for the role Automation Specialist:

Location: Remote
Experience: Minimum 3 years
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Automation Specialist with at least 3 years of experience in designing and implementing workflow automation solutions. The ideal candidate will have expertise in tools such as n8n, Zapier, Make.com, or similar platforms, and a strong background in integrating APIs, streamlining processes, and enhancing operational efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:

    Develop and implement automated workflows to optimize business processes.
    Integrate third-party APIs and systems to create seamless data flow.
    Analyze, debug, and improve existing automation setups.
    Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify automation opportunities.
    Monitor and maintain automation systems to ensure reliability.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

    Proven 3+ years of experience in workflow automation and integration.
    Proficiency with tools like n8n, Zapier, or Make.com.
    Strong understanding of APIs, webhooks, and data transformation.
    Familiarity with scripting languages (e.g., JavaScript or Python).
    Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

    Experience with database management and cloud services.
    Background in business process analysis or RPA tools.

Why Join Us?

    Opportunity to work on cutting-edge automation projects.
    Supportive and collaborative team environment.
    Competitive salary and benefits package.

assignments.name: Name
assignments.value: ={{ $('On form submission').item.json['First Name'] + " " + $('On form submission').item.json['Last Name'] }}

parameters.content: ## Grab User Details and Update in Airtable

## Download the CV and get the job description and requirements.
- ### Send the details to ChatGPT to score the viability of the candidate

parameters.text:
=Compare the following job description and resume. Assign a qualification score between 0 and 1, where 1 indicates the best match. Provide only the score and the reason for the score in less than 20 words.
Job Description: Must use Airtable tool to get the job description
Resume: 
{{ $json.text }} 
you need to use the airtable tool

values.content:
=Given the following job description and candidate CV, create 5 insightful interview questions to gather more information about the candidate's suitability for the role. The questions should focus on:

    Specific projects the candidate has worked on.
    Key responsibilities and achievements in their previous roles.
    Skills relevant to the job description.
    Problem-solving abilities and how they handled challenges.
    Alignment with the company’s goals and values.

Provide the questions in a clear, concise format.

Job Description:
Use the airtable tool to get the job description

Candidate CV:
{{ $('Extract from File').item.json.text }}

options.formDescription: Kindly fill in the following questions to proceed.

values.content:
=Craft a personalized email to the interviewee, expressing interest in continuing the conversation over a phone call. The email should mention strengths or achievements from their CV or questionnaire responses, and include a polite request to have the phone conversation. Ensure the tone is professional and warm.

Provide an output of 
To:
Subject:
Content:

Inputs:

    {{ $('Extract from File').item.json.text }}
    
    {{ $json.fields['Q&A'] }}


Example email:
Dear [Candidate's Name],

Thank you for submitting your application and responses to the questionnaire for the AI automation engineer position. We were impressed by [specific strength or achievement from their CV or questionnaire, e.g., "your experience in automating workflows using n8n, which aligns closely with our goals"].

We’d love to continue the conversation to discuss your experience further. 

Looking forward to speaking with you soon.



NOTE: 
Sign off the email with

Regards,
Francis

=Your job is ONLY to book a meeting in the calendar using the Google Calendar tool.
Check the interviewer's Google Calendar for the next day between 8:00 AM and 5:00 PM.
Search for ONE SINGLE 30-minute slot that does not overlap with any existing calendar event.
A slot is considered free only if no event starts, ends, or occurs within that time range.
Example: If an event is 9:00–9:30, then 9:00–9:30 is not free, but 9:30–10:00 may be.
Start checking from 8:00 AM and move forward in 30-minute increments until 5:00 PM.
If a valid free slot is found:
Use the calendar tool to book a meeting in that slot. set the description of the meeting as: "Phone Interview- {{ $('Airtable').item.json.fields.Name }} " 
Return the result in the following format:
Start time: [YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM]  
End time: [YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM]  
Inputs: - The interviewer's calendar events - Today's date: {{ $today }}

You MUST use the Google Calendar tool to create the event. 
Do not respond with plain text or summaries. 
Only return output after calling the tool successfully.

=Given the  job description, along with the candidate's CV and their responses to the questionnaires, generate a list of screening questions that will help gauge the candidate's suitability for the role. The questions should focus on understanding the candidate’s relevant experience, skills, and cultural fit. The questions should take into account both the job description and the candidate's background and responses. Provide a minimum of 5 questions.

Use the tools to get the job description and the applicant's responses to the questionnaires.

Applicant's CV:
{{ $('Extract from File').item.json.text }}


Give the output as various sentences as a paragraph with every new question in a numbered list:
Screening Questions:

parameters.content:
## Actions
- ### Change the `Form Description` with the job description you are hiring for.
- ### Make sure to check and change the prompts if need be to suit your use case.
- ### Use the Simple Applicant Tracker template on Airtable to set up the tables required.

values.content:
=Craft a personalized email to the interviewee, professionally and sensitively rejecting them for the position. The email should mention their weakness from their CV and include the reason why they are not suitable for the position. Ensure the tone is professional and warm.

Provide an output of 
To:
Subject:
Content:

Inputs:
{{ $json.fields['Email address'] }}
{{ $json.fields.Name }}
{{ $('AI Agent').item.json.output.score }}
{{ $('AI Agent').item.json.output.reason }}
{{ $('applicant details').item.json.JD }}
Example email:
Dear [Candidate's Name],

Thank you for submitting your application and responses to the questionnaire for the AI automation engineer position. 

After careful consideration, we have decided to move forward with other candidates whose professional background and qualifications are more closely aligned with the requirements of this role. We sincerely appreciate your interest and the effort you invested in your application. We wish you every success in your future career endeavors and thank you again for considering us. 


NOTE: 
Sign off the email with

Regards,
Tama
